name: Disaster
description:
Disaster - You are going to take on the role of a bank robber in an ordinary city. This day did not bode well, but a terrible event happened. You have to find out what is happening here. Use everything that comes to hand and find a way out of this situation! Destroy everyone who gets in your way and do everything to survive! Free the city from the terrible monsters that have invaded it. You and your friends are left with the only way out is to fight the enemy!

Peculiarities:
- Play a small campaign in single player mode.
- Explore a new world.
- Go on an exciting journey!
